```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message= FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


This document will show how to import data.

## Import the FAS Litters CSV and Fixing Column Names 
```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```
Only using clean names function inside janitor package so we aren't going to load whole janitor package


## Look at the dataset
```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df, 10)
```

```{r eval= FALSE}
view(litters_df)
```
Want this to be False when using view bc when you knit it it gets confused
